title: Leak confirms OpenAI's ChatGPT will integrate MCP
summary: ChatGPT is testing support for Model Context Protocol (MCP), which will allow the AI to connect to third-party services and use them as context. [...]

title: ChatGPT will soon record, transcribe, and summarize your meetings
summary: OpenAI may be planning to challenge Microsoft Teams Copilot integration with a new "Record" feature in ChatGPT. [...]

title: Windows 10 KB5058379 update triggers BitLocker recovery on some devices
summary: The Windows 10 KB5058379 cumulative update is triggering unexpected BitLocker recovery prompts on some devices afters it's installed and the computer restarted. [...]

title: Breachforums Boss to Pay $700k in Healthcare Breach
summary: In what experts are calling a novel legal outcome, the 22-year-old former administrator of the cybercrime community Breachforums will forfeit nearly $700,000 to settle a civil lawsuit from a health insurance company whose customer data was posted for sale on the forum in 2023. Conor Brian Fitzpatric

title: Government webmail hacked via XSS bugs in global spy campaign
summary: Hackers are running a worldwide cyberespionage campaign dubbed 'RoundPress,' leveraging zero-day and n-day flaws in webmail servers to steal email from high-value government organizations. [...]

title: FBI: US officials targeted in voice deepfake attacks since April
summary: The FBI warned that cybercriminals using AI-generated audio deepfakes to target U.S. officials in voice phishing attacks that started in April. [...]

title: Meta to Train AI on E.U. User Data From May 27 Without Consent; Noyb Threatens Lawsuit

title: Nova Scotia Power confirms hackers stole customer data in cyberattack
summary: Nova Scotia Power confirms it suffered a data breach after threat actors stole sensitive customer data in a cybersecurity incident discovered last month. [...]
